quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: It’s like I have to keep proving the same point over and over, and nothing changes.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I know, and that’s not fair on you.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: That’s not support, that’s me being worn down.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I understand, and I don’t want you to feel that way.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: But it’s what’s happening. I feel like they’re just waiting for me to give up.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I hear you. I’ll keep pressing so that doesn’t happen.

contradictions.issue: Victim reports being worn down by repetition vs. advocate acknowledges but offers no systemic fix

timeline_hooks.link: Pattern of institutional erosion of victim resilience

timeline_hooks.ref: waiting for me to give up
